snippet.title: Lost Rift | Announce Trailer | Coming to Steam Early Access
snippet.description:
Lost Rift is a high-stakes First-Person Survival Shooter Adventure blending base-building, cooperative PvE, and intense PvPvE gameplay. Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3494520/
Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/yqz4kwY7hB

Designed for solo play and up to 5-player co-op, explore the rich and immersive world where every decision can alter your fate. You wash up on a beach at Pioneer's Landing, one island in a beautiful and mysterious archipelago. On your PvE island, gather resources, build a camp, craft equipment, and triumph over the local fauna to survive and prepare for intense PvPvE expeditions.
